alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 12:22PM MST until February 26 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
